summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Parties (Muhataplar) module - both backend API and frontend UI are fully functional. All CRUD operations, filtering, search, and navigation features working correctly.

minor_issues.issue: Returns HTTP 200 instead of 201 for resource creation
minor_issues.impact: Minor - functionality works correctly, just non-standard status code

passed_tests: Parties list page loading and display
Party creation with all types (SUPPLIER, CUSTOMER, BOTH, INTERNAL)
Party search functionality (by name, code, phone)
Party type filtering (Tümü, Tedarikçi, Müşteri, İkisi)
Party positions display (Has Altın, USD, EUR) with correct color coding
Party detail page with 3 position cards
Party detail page tabs (İşlemler, Stok Hareketleri, Ödemeler)
Responsive UI elements and proper data-testid attributes
